SEARCH
Package com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication

Class Database

java.lang.Object
com.example.eventlotterysystemapplication.Model.Database
public class Database extends Object
An instance of this class represents a connection to the firebase firestore database

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Database()
    Initializes the database object, without being given any database or authorization
    Database(com.google.firebase.firestore.FirebaseFirestore firestore, com.google.firebase.auth.FirebaseAuth firebaseAuth)
    Initializes the database object, given some database and authorization

  • Method Details

    • queryDeviceID

      public void queryDeviceID(String deviceID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Boolean> listener)
      Given some input deviceID, this function checks to see if the deviceID exists in the database in the User collection
      Parameters:
      deviceID - The device ID to query for in the database
      listener - An OnCompleteListener used to retrieve the boolean

    • getUserFromDeviceID

      public void getUserFromDeviceID(String deviceID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<User> listener)
      Given some input deviceID, returns the User object that is associated with that deviceID
      Parameters:
      deviceID - The deviceID of the user
      listener - An OnCompleteListener for callback

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String userID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<User> listener)
      Given some userID, this function returns the corresponding User object
      Parameters:
      userID - The userID to query against
      listener - An OnCompleteListener for callback
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - If the userID does not exist in the database

    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> listener)
      Given a user, add it to the database
      Parameters:
      user - The user profile
      listener - An OnCompleteListener that will be called when the add operation finishes Logs an error if the database cannot add the user

      Parameters:
      user - The user profile
      listener - An OnCompleteListener that will be called when the modify operation finishes

      Given a user, delete their record from the database
      Parameters:
      user - The user profile
      listener - An OnCompleteListener that will be called when the delete operation finishes

    • getEvent

      @RequiresApi(api=26) public void getEvent(String eventID, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Event> listener)
      Given some eventID, this method finds the event and returns that event object from the database
      Parameters:
      eventID - The eventID of the event you are trying to retrieve
      listener - An OnCompleteListener used to retrieve the Event
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - This exception is thrown if no event exists with that eventID, if the registration collection retrieval fails, or if the user status is not properly defined

    • viewAvailableEvents

      @RequiresApi(api=26) public void viewAvailableEvents(User user, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<List<Event>> listener)
      Retrieves all events that the user can join
      Parameters:
      user - The user profile
      listener - An OnCompleteListener used to retrieve a list of Events

      Parameters:

      listener - An OnCompleteListener that will be called when the add operation finishes

    • addNotificationLog

      public void addNotificationLog()

    • parseEvent

      @RequiresApi(api=26) public Event parseEvent(com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Event> listener)
      Given some DocumentSnapshot from the "Event" collection, this method takes the fields from that document and manually matches it up with the fields from the event class, giving us fine control over what is added to what fields in this class
      Parameters:
      doc - The document from the Event collection to be parsed
      listener - An OnCompleteListener for callback
      Returns:
      An event object, where the correct fields are extracted from the document

    • updateEventRegistration

      public void updateEventRegistration(Event event, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentReference doc, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> listener)
      Given some event and a document containing information for the event, this function will take the users in the entrant list of the event and add them to the "Registration" subcollection of the event's document
      Parameters:
      event - The event document from which we want to extract the entrant list data
      doc - The DocumentReference of the document that we want to insert the users in the entrant list to the registration subcollection
      listener - An OnCompleteListener for callback

    • parseEventRegistration

      public void parseEventRegistration(Event event, com.google.firebase.firestore.DocumentSnapshot doc, com.google.android.gms.tasks.OnCompleteListener<Void> listener)
      Takes data from registration subcollection and stores it in the entrant list object that is owned by the event class
      Parameters:
      event - The event whose entrant lists we want to populate
      doc - The document from which we want to extract the entrants from its registration subcollection
      listener - An OnCompleteListener for callback
